name: ChessAce: Checkers Invasion!
description: ChessAce: Checker Invasion is a 3D Platformer Action-Adventure game that can be played at most by two players, which combined the type of Chess and Adventure. The game idea is based on the game Megaman and Super Mario, in which the main character s needs to defeat various bosses and saves their Kingdom. In this game, players can change to become more powerful and more potent at some point in the level. The game is a sequel of a 2D Game ChessAce, developed by one of the team member in his solo project. The gameplay heavily focus on the story.
